name: mycotrack-v2
description: MycoTrack - Sistem Monitoring dan Manajemen Budidaya Jamur Kuping

scripts.dev:all: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --restart-tries 3 --restart-after 2000 --prefix "[{name}]" --names "ml,backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "yellow,blue,green" "npm run dev:ml" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.kill:all: node scripts/kill-port.js 3000 && node scripts/kill-port.js 5000 && node scripts/kill-port.js 5173 && node scripts/kill-port.js 5175
scripts.build:frontend: npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
